attributes.action: Ban the gruesome slaughtering of whales and dolphins in the Faroe Islands.
attributes.additional_details: Every summer 800 whales and dolphins are slaughtered brutally for their meat! This is inhumane and should be stopped!
attributes.background: The headline of the article I saw today was "Sea turns red with blood as pod of 200 pilot whales and 40 dolphins are slaughtered for their meat in the remote Faroe Islands" - how is this still acceptable in today's society! Something needs to be done to stop this!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government aren't responsible for the Faroe Islands.

You could start a petition asking the Government to put pressure on the Faroe Islands Government to ban whaling, if that is what you would like to see happen.
